about_the_game:
TTEOTS Premium: Receive all premium content for Book 01 for a flat price! This version contains additional content not found in the free version, such as extra scenes, choices, and full color illustrations. This does NOT include the Extra Stories section, which exists outside the books.

Please note: If you install this after beginning the free version, you will need to begin a new game, as your old save may not recognize the DLC. You can always go to Settings > Skip All Text to skip through the game and resume your previous location.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains written descriptions of graphic violence, some minor visual representations of said violence, alcohol, and allusions to sexual activity. There is one situation in which a character tries to seduce another through their abilities where the player must decide whether to resist or give in that may bring up associations of non-consensual sex for very sensitive players.

detailed_description:
TTEOTS Premium: Receive all premium content for Book 01 for a flat price! This version contains additional content not found in the free version, such as extra scenes, choices, and full color illustrations. This does NOT include the Extra Stories section, which exists outside the books.

Please note: If you install this after beginning the free version, you will need to begin a new game, as your old save may not recognize the DLC. You can always go to Settings > Skip All Text to skip through the game and resume your previous location.

fullgame.name: To the Edge of the Sky

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Sound Card: Any
